body: Here is [the fix](https://github.com/bearburger/net/commit/42ac75393ced8c48137b574278522df1f3fa2cec) but I need someone who completely understand how parser and tokenizer works as I'm not sure if there is no side effects of my changes. Also I'm not sure if it works as it should in edge case tests like `<noscript><iframe></noscript>`. All tests are updated to new version so I think for one of the core package maintainers shouldn't be hard to understand what has been changed and check if it works OK.
